abstract: The man charged with killing a security guard at Washington’s Holocaust Museum had a brief email exchange with mega-author Tom Clancy.
snippet: The man charged with killing a security guard at Washington’s Holocaust Museum had a brief email exchange with mega-author Tom Clancy.
lead_paragraph: One of the more bizarre connections uncovered by a Google search for James W. von Brunn, the chief suspect in the fatal shooting at Washington’s Holocaust Museum on Wednesday, was an apparent correspondence between Mr. von Brunn, an 88-year-old white supremacist, and Tom Clancy, the mega-best-selling military thriller writer.

headline.main: Accused Museum Gunman Exchanged E-mail With Tom Clancy
